channel.title: Here is my way of ( portforwarding ) ( makeing NO-IP ) ikki's is better
channel.description:
--- hope it helps some poeple ---
1) go to www.no-ip.com - download no-ip duc - read instructions to set it up - then make a no-ip.biz or no-ip.org ( etc )
2) portfowarding - linex router - type this into your internet bar ( 192.168.1.1 ) - User is ( blank ) and pass is ( admin )
3) setting up server - once your on ( 192.168.1.1 ) - click the tab that says ( gameing )
4) cmd - open up start button in bottom left hand corner of your screen - open search - type in cmd - then open it - once you have opened it then type in ( ipconfig ) into your cmd scroll down till you find your ip
5) back to web - type in your ( ip ) into the box that says ( 192.168.1. [ ] ) in the [ ] type the last 3 numbers of your ip in there - then save and continue
once you have done that regisgter it on moparscape
hope i helped

item.description:
@i_ownd_u_i wrote:

— hope it helps some poeple —

  1. go to www.no-ip.com
  • download no-ip duc
  • read instructions to set it up
  • then make a no-ip.biz or no-ip.org ( etc )
  1. portfowarding
  • linex router
  • type this into your internet bar ( 192.168.1.1 )
  • User is ( blank ) and pass is ( admin )
  1. setting up server
  • once your on ( 192.168.1.1 )
  • click the tab that says ( gameing )
  1. cmd
  • open up start button in bottom left hand corner of your screen
  • open search
  • type in cmd
  • then open it
  • once you have opened it then type in ( ipconfig ) into your cmd scroll down till you find your ip
  1. back to web
  • type in your ( ip ) into the box that says ( 192.168.1. [ ] ) in the [ ] type the last 3 numbers of your ip in there
  • then save and continue

once you have done that regisgter it on moparscape

hope i helped
